text: the new British government has already
announced cuts to its defense budget it
looks like it's inevitable now that
Britain's defense spending will come
below two percent of GDP what's your
message to your colleagues in London my
message to my colleagues in London like
to all the other capitals of the NATO
countries is to stick to the pledge they
all made which was to if they were below
two percent to achieve to present and
Britain is are always had an independent
ability to express itself and basically
punch above its weight I hate to see
that go away because I think it's a
great loss to the world when a country
of that much history and standing for so
much to so many people around the world
that takes actions which seemed to
indicate disengagement we needed engaged
united kingdom
